agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Veteran Affairs & Border Security TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, March 27, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Donna Campbell SB 822 Nelson Relating to the administration of a grant program to support community mental health programs for veterans and their families. SB 1180 Menéndez Relating to certain procedures applicable to veterans who participate in veterans treatment court programs and to a court cost imposed on conviction to benefit those programs; changing a fee. SB 1597 Hall Relating to awarding certain medals for military service performed individually or as part of a crew. SB 2047 Zaffirini Relating to pro bono legal services for veterans and service members and an exemption from the state bar membership fee for attorneys providing those services. SB 2048 Zaffirini Relating to the use of the fund for veterans' assistance to provide pro bono legal services to veterans and active duty service members. SB 2104 Zaffirini Relating to the creation of the Texas Veterans County Service Officer Task Force.
